price: ߣߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߙߌ߬ߞߌ ߘߏ߲߬ ߝߙߊߣߍ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߞߕߐ߫ ߸ ߥߎߦߊ ߦߋ߫ ߡߏ߬ߛߏ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߕߌ߮ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
